title: Bluetooth RGB Addressable LED Controller
shortDesc: ESP32-C3 based addressable RGB LED controller with wireless connectivity.
fullDescription: An ESP32-C3 based addressable RGB LED PCB featuring Bluetooth and WiFi connectivity, powered by a lithium-ion battery with integrated charging and protection circuitry.

title: Smart Aquarium Water Control PCB
shortDesc: Automated aquarium pump and water management controller.
fullDescription: Custom PCB for a smart aquarium water management system featuring ESP32, L298N motor control, power regulation, status LEDs, buzzer alerts, and user buttons for pump and connectivity control.

title: Bluetooth-enabled Multiswitch Slim
shortDesc: ESP32-C3 based smart switch with multi-input support.
fullDescription: Slim ESP32-C3 PCB interfacing with toggle switch and external push buttons, supporting wide 5Vâ€“24V input with onboard regulation.

title: GNSS/GSM Necklace Tracker
shortDesc: Compact wearable tracker with GNSS and GSM connectivity.
fullDescription: Designed schematics, PCB layout, BOM, and pick-and-place files for a GNSS/GSM based wearable necklace tracker using Altium Designer.

title: Arduino Nano RP2040 Robot Shield
shortDesc: Compact robot control shield with power and motor drivers.
fullDescription: Custom shield for Arduino Nano RP2040 integrating MP2636 power booster, DRV8835 motor driver, and battery system for compact robotics applications.

title: NRF Telemetry HAT
shortDesc: Precision power monitoring and CAN-bus expansion for the nRF9151 SoC.
fullDescription: A professional-grade expansion HAT designed specifically for the nRF9151 Development Kit. It features integrated CAN communication, high-precision power measurement circuitry, reliable power regulation, and an onboard SD card slot for local data logging, enabling comprehensive telemetry in remote monitoring applications.

title: STM32F411CEU6 Development System
shortDesc: High-performance MCU breakout board optimized for signal integrity.
fullDescription: Custom STM32 PCB Design featuring the STM32F411CEU6 (Black Pill architecture) MCU. The project involved rigorous schematic capture and multi-layer PCB layout design using Altium Designer, focusing on power decoupling and optimized trace routing.

title: USB to UART Converter
shortDesc: High-speed bridge with selectable voltage levels and LED diagnostics.
fullDescription: A robust USB-to-Serial bridge PCB featuring a jumper-selectable 3.3V/5V power rail. The design includes dedicated RX, TX, and Power status LEDs, providing real-time visual feedback for serial communication and power delivery during firmware debugging.
